short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for temporarily modifying a single weather result on the Google search results page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helper extension for performing the Tempestarii magic effect. For full instructions, see this document: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1XnVWGWJPHBHg6BbJTpZptn_9SrZhFqQgWH4iLUJxM-8/edit
